title: [license] license problem of torch/lib/TH/THHalf.c
body_html:
When performing license check on Pytorch debian package I found this license problem:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/THHalf.c

License of Pytorch is BSD-3-Clause, however THHalf.c is non-free according to its header.
body_text:
When performing license check on Pytorch debian package I found this license problem:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/THHalf.c
License of Pytorch is BSD-3-Clause, however THHalf.c is non-free according to its header.
body:
When performing license check on Pytorch debian package I found this license problem:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/THHalf.c

License of Pytorch is BSD-3-Clause, however THHalf.c is non-free according to its header.
